text: ¶ The word which Jeremiah the prophet commanded Seraiah the son of Neriah, the son of Maaseiah, when he went with Zedekiah the king of Judah into Babylon in the fourth year of his reign. And this Seraiah was a quiet prince.51.59 with: or, on the behalf of51.59 quiet…: or, prince of Menucha, or, chief chamberlain
